patthana22.4:1.1: Nakusalaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana22.4:2.1: (Naakusale dve, naabyākate dve. Paṭhamaṁ gaṇitakena ekaṁ, dutiyaṁ gaṇitakena ekaṁ, tatiyaṁ gaṇitakena ekaṁ, sabbattha nava pañhā.)
patthana22.4:3.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.4:4.1: Nakusalaṁ naahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.4:5.1: Nakusalaṁ nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava. (Hetusahetukasadisaṁ.)
patthana22.4:6.1: Nakusalaṁ nahetuvippayuttañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.4:7.1: Nakusalaṁ nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.4:8.1: Nakusalaṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.4:9.1: Naakusalaṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.4:10.1: Naabyākataṁ nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Gaṇitakena tīṇi pañhā.)
patthana22.4:11.1: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
